Package controller

Class TicTacToeStrategy

java.lang.Object
controller.TicTacToeStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
RowGameRulesStrategy
public class TicTacToeStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RowGameRulesStrategy
Implementation of Tic Tac Toe game using Strategy Pattern.

    • isWin

      public boolean isWin​(RowGameModel gameModel, int row, int col)
      Checks if current move leads to a win condition and returns true if any win condition is satisfied, otherwise return false.
      Specified by:
      isWin in interface RowGameRulesStrategy
      Parameters:
      gameModel - RowGameModel object that is affected.
      row - Row of element to check for win condition.
      col - Column of element to check for win condition.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on whether win condition is satified.

    • isTie

      public boolean isTie​(RowGameModel gameModel)
      Checks if there is tie. Method should be invoked after checking for win condition.
      Specified by:
      isTie in interface RowGameRulesStrategy
      Parameters:
      gameModel - RowGameModel object that is affected.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on whether gameboard has reached tie status.

    • checkPattern

      public boolean checkPattern​(RowGameModel gameModel, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int x3, int y3)
      Checks if the content of the three points given are equal.
      Parameters:
      gameModel - RowGameModel object that is affected.
      x1 - x (row) coordinate of first point.
      y1 - y (column) coordinate of first point.
      x2 - x (row) coordinate of second point.
      y2 - y (column) coordinate of second point.
      x3 - x (row) coordinate of third point.
      y3 - y (column) coordinate of third point.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on whether the contents of the three points match.
